name: Psycho Lolita - VIOLENT High School the Third Term
description:
Deano Peppers writes and draws this short story about the London School of Lucha Libre Luchador "PSYCHO LOLITA". This is a 7x5 FULL COLOR 8 page mini comic featuring an excerpt of one of the many* Japanese gore films starring Psycho Lolita, this one involves School Girls, School girls with cat ears and School girls in top hats with BEWBS!!

All pages printed card

*totally maid up Japanese gore films (see what I did there?)

Comics are made to demand so please give a few extra days for delivery

name: Psycho Lolita - Octopus maid must destroy Tokyo
description:
Deano Peppers writes and draws this short story about the London School of Lucha Libre Luchador "PSYCHO LOLITA". This is a 7x5 FULL COLOR 8 page mini comic featuring an excerpt of one of the many* Japanese gore films starring Psycho Lolita, it involves Maids, Octopuses and the Mafia... like most stereotypical Japanese films do.

All pages printed card

*totally maid up Japanese gore films (see what I did there?)

name: Devil Dolls: Go Down... Under (Deluxe Edition)
description:
A hearty mix of cartoons, exploitation and horror movies, sprinkled liberally with pop culture references and with a soupçon of "Carry on" innuendo is what lovingly goes into each and every Devil Doll story. 3 girls and 1 cat causing crazy chaos in already chaotic situations. Dealing with the supernatural, the unknown and the weird  in the only way they know... punching it in the face really hard!

Devil Dolls, it's not just a comic book, it's a Deano Peppers comic book

The Devil Dolls packed their bags and went to a land down under, where women glow and men plunder, can't you hear them thunder, you better run, you better take cover.

32 pages in a compact 7x5 comic, self published entirely by Deano Peppers at the 8oClockcomics studio... spare room

Deluxe edition - Full colour cover on 167gm heavyweight matte paper with black and white inside on 100gm textured laid white paper, feels lovely on your finger tips and super smashing great on your comic book shelf.

Comics are made to demand so please give a few extra days for delivery

name: Devil Dolls: Book of the Bread
description:
A hearty mix of cartoons, exploitation and horror movies, sprinkled liberally with pop culture references and with a soupçon of "Carry on" innuendo is what lovingly goes into each and every Devil Doll story. 3 girls and 1 cat causing crazy chaos in already chaotic situations. Dealing with the supernatural, the unknown and the weird  in the only way they know... punching it in the face really hard!

Devil Dolls, it's not just a comic book, it's a Deano Peppers comic book

The Devil Dolls van conveniently breaks down next to a bakery that is currently being affected by a infection of it's yeast. What follows is a romp of Romero proportions.

Devil Dolls: Book of the Bread is around 80 pages collecting the Devil Dolls 'Bread Trilogy" comics and some bonus pin up art and puts then in a delightful trade paperback. it's printed in the traditional 6 ⅝" × 10 ¼ comics format by Lulu.com.

Copies of this comic will be kept in stock, in the event they are not a few extra days may be added to delivery

name: Devil Dolls: Go Down... Under (Trashcan Edition)
description:
A hearty mix of cartoons, exploitation and horror movies, sprinkled liberally with pop culture references and with a soupçon of "Carry on" innuendo is what lovingly goes into each and every Devil Doll story. 3 girls and 1 cat causing crazy chaos in already chaotic situations. Dealing with the supernatural, the unknown and the weird  in the only way they know... punching it in the face really hard!

Devil Dolls, it's not just a comic book, it's a Deano Peppers comic book

The Devil Dolls packed their bags and went to a land down under, where women glow and men plunder, can't you hear them thunder, you better run, you better take cover.

32 pages in a compact 7x5 comic, self published entirely by Deano Peppers at the 8oClockcomics studio... spare room

Trashcan edition - all black and white cover and inside. Cover printed using various coloured bog standard 140gm card and 80gm (mostly) white paper for the inside pages it's a 7 X 5 trashalicious bundle of fun.

Please tick white page option below if you want white inside pages

Comics are made to demand so please give a few extra days for delivery
